import numpy as np

f = open("sample_AAPL.txt", "r")
listItems = f.read().splitlines()
appleprices=listItems
for i in range(0, len(listItems)):
 appleprices[i] = float(listItems[i])

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
print(appleprices)

print(np.mean(appleprices))
print(np.std(appleprices))
